comments.body: Without this feature, openconnect does not work in WSL

Developer feature. While it's possible to work around most end-user application scenarios (e.g., setup VPN into Windows itself), if you want to *develop* Unix software and need tun support, you're pretty much out of luck currently.
TUN/TAP networking is pretty crucial for us.

Also in Windows 10 Build 1709 this is still not possible.
Hence that once more I too request that it be added in the future.
Thanks,
Peter J. Jansen
/tun and /tap. Mix with that proper NFS support and I'll be unblocked.
It will be great to have this support in WSL..
I believe it would require a lot of effort; it'll be more than appreciated to implement this crucial feature!
Please support this feature as soon as possible.
